title: HOUR 3- Reggie Miller Sep 28, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Reggie Miller Sep 28, 2020
description:
Reggie Miller tells Dan that he is picking the Miami Heat to win over the Los Angeles Lakers in 7 games. Reggie says that he understands that the Lakers should win, but says he is going with his heart and picking the Heat.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
